name: places/ChIJo5DlPvPzwokRZzubBZnuHkA
adrFormatAddress: 4055 10th Ave, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
Two Saturday late nights almost in a row where the gate was closed....no one was in the booth ....and they even had the nerve to leave a sign saying they would be back in 30 mins...only to leave a another customer out for at least 50 mins leaving him stranded without his car. Ridiculous.

EDIT UPDATE.

Since this review, the mgmt actually contacted me and listened to my complaint. The issue was handled. Even though I still think that there are moments when there is long wait time due to the sheer volume of cars being checked in and out and there is only one staff member present to handle it, I must say that the crew (managed by my main man Dez) are all pleasant and hard working. Based on the customer service and pivot from my initial experience, I've added some stars.

originalText.text: Beware! Absolutely no responsibility or accountability over services rendered.  I have been parking here for 5+ years under previous management since the take over, no longer can you call for your car to be ready (no one answers the phone) on most mornings you end up picking up your own vehicle on the ramp.  Little oversight.  Noticed damages to my bumper, had to jump through hoops to make a proper report only to be denied.  Do NOT take your luxury vehicle to this lot.  It will not be returned to you in the same condition you dropped it off in.

originalText.text: Absolutely horrendous trying to get a monthly space. Been trying for 3 weeks. No one returns calls. Manager apparently only works until 3pm (who does that when people work normal jobs until 5pm)? No one else seems to know what to do or how to answer questions. Corporate inquiry says "we respond in 24hrs" - no you don't! Only reason I need this garage is less than a block from my house.

originalText.text: The Porters are very nice and fast. Only drawback is your car will be outside, on the roof, most likely. I didnt realize that until I got my friend's car one day when it had snowed. Was looking forward to not having to clean the car off. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è No biggie for the monthly price, it's a deal.

originalText.text:
I  was waiting for three hours, and don't understand why so long since they were only ten people when I got here.
They need to speed the process, security told me that after lunch the relax and take forever. I got here in the morning and left late.
